text:
The #COVID19 Dashboard has been updated: https://t.co/XhspoyTG79

On Wed 21 April, 2,396 new cases and 22 deaths within 28 days of a positive test were reported across the UK.

33,139,742 people have now received the first dose of a #vaccine. 10,775,817 have received a 2nd dose. https://t.co/t7L2bLVahT
